sense.def:
One's intent
je namen neke osebe, da bo nekaj storila;

seg.quote: The conference declared its intent to organize a national movement.
They signed a declaration of intent.

sense.def:
To look intent
pomeni kazati, da smo zelo pozorni.

seg.quote: She was brushing her hair, intent on her face in the mirror.
I stood behind a parked van, watching intently.

sense.def:
Kdor je
intent on doing something
, je odločen, da bo nekaj storil.

seg.quote: They were intent on keeping what they had.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
to all intents and purposes
nakažemo, da neke okoliščine niso natančno take, kot jih opisujemo, njihov učinek pa je tak, kot da bi bile.

seg.quote: She was to all intents and purposes the infant's mother.
